answers.answer: im 32+3 and my sleeping has reached its worst point and everything irritates me from my husband to my 6yr old to my cat lol so I know how you feel. My back and hip kills me as well, at least we dont have much longer.

I am 34+2 wks and I feel the same way..I am so ready 4 my baby girl 2 get here, this is my 5th pregnancy. I have a 12, 11, 4, & a 10 month old. I am do April 8 but I honestly think she'll come b4 that. I can feel my body getting ready.

I am 34+2 wks and I feel the same way..I am so ready 4 my baby girl 2 get here, this is my 5th pregnancy. I have a 12, 11, 4, y//o & a 10 month old. I am do April 8 but I honestly think she'll come b4 that. I can feel my body getting ready.
Glad im not alone. :)  my due date is the 9th of april. And i too feel like ill have the baby early. I never go full term. My first was 34 wks and my second was at 36.
I'm 34+6 and I am totally over being pregnant. This id my 1st baby and I am so nervous. I'm ready to get it over with.

I'm 34 weeks due april 11, and i so get what you mean. I have been feeling quite crampy right down low, and my hips are so sore from sleeping side to side all night. This is my third baby also, and i'm not sure if i'll go early, on time or over. Although i don't think i'll go over, i'm 37 with gestational diabetes and possibly a small baby, (although my stomach feels huge like i'm about to pop). I wish you all the best, we are all so close now!

question: 6 weeks more to go but the way my body feels im ready to have my son. Sleeping ***** and my hip/pelvic bones lock up on me. That my only way to describe it.. this is my third pregnancy i have a 5 and 3 year old. Both girls... but i feel like lately i havent had the patience with them. I feel so bad. Who also can relate to me ??
title: 34 weeks
